alert.note: Alert for Merced (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 22 at 1:59AM PDT until further notice by NWS Hanford
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in California... Merced River at Stevinson affecting Merced County. For the Merced River...including Happy Isles, Pohono Bridge, Stevinson...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING FOR A DAM FLOODGATE RELEASE REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Merced River at Stevinson. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 70.5 feet, Water is up to the maintenance building in Hagaman Park. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1:00 AM PDT Wednesday the stage was 71.4 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 1:00 AM PDT Wednesday was 71.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to temporarily fall below flood stage this later today and continue falling to 69.5 feet early tomorrow afternoon before rising above flood stage again Friday. - Flood stage is 71.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 70.5 feet on 03/21/2011. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Location Fld Observed Forecasts (2 am PDT) -------- Stg Stg Day/Time Thu Fri Sat Merced River Stevinson 71.0 71.4 Wed 1 am PDT 68.9 70.7 71.3 &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
